description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The goal of the game is to defeat the enemy toy submarines using a submarine you construct out of various components purchased through the shipyard, all while confined to a fish tank.
description.short: The goal of the game is to defeat the enemy toy submarines using a submarine you construct out of various components purchased through the shipyard, all while confined to a fish tank.
